alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:15PM CDT until August 07 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in northwestern Alabama... Lamar County in west central Alabama... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 115 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Russellville to 6 miles north of Trebloc, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Winfield, Haleyville, Vernon, Sulligent, Guin, Hackleburg, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Detroit, Beaverton, Gu- Win, Weston, Blooming Grove, Lamar County Airport, Brinn, Lake Buttahatchee, Crews, Bedford and Crossville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
